mapper.select: SELECT a.gui_id as guiId, a.machine_id as machineId, a.x_coordinate as xCoordinate, a.y_coordinate as yCoordinate, a.machine_type as machineType, c.material_code as materialCode, b.stock FROM machine_gui_info a JOIN machine_raw_material_reserve b ON a.machine_id = b.machine_id JOIN raw_materials c ON b.material_code = c.material_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO machine_gui_info (machine_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, machine_type) VALUES (#{machineId}, #{xCoordinate}, #{yCoordinate}, #{machineType})
mapper.update: UPDATE machine_gui_info SET x_coordinate = #{xCoordinate}, y_coordinate = #{yCoordinate}, machine_type = #{machineType} WHERE machine_id = #{machineId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.machine_id FROM machine_info a LEFT JOIN machine_gui_info b ON a.machine_id = b.machine_id WHERE b.machine_id IS NULL
